name: Parkour Race - Freerun Game
description:
Welcome to the wonderful world of Parkour Race!

Jump from building to building in a crazy race to the finish line

We have: wall jumps, vaulting, cat leap, precision landing and many more. Every time you successfully land a trick, you will get faster

Use you skills to be the first to the finish line!

Of course, feel free to give us feedbacks and tell us what you would like to see in the next update!
